description: Dive into this easy dinner recipe featuring the tropical flavour combo of chicken, pineapple and slaw.
keywords: Easy Chicken, Pineapple & Golden Citrus Slaw
name: Easy Chicken, Pineapple & Golden Citrus Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top salad with chicken, drizzle over reserved dressing and scatter over reserved dried fruit. Serve with toasted bread.
